      • canBuildRoad

        public boolean canBuildRoad(EdgeLocation edgeLoc)
        Parameters:
        edgeLoc - The location (one of the 6 sides of one hex on the board) where the road is to be placed.
        Returns:
        true if the given edge location is adjacent to at least one of the player's roads or municipalities (city or settlement), and that there is no currently placed road at that location.

      • doBuildRoad

        public boolean doBuildRoad()

      • canBuildSettlement

        public boolean canBuildSettlement(VertexLocation vertexLoc)
        Parameters:
        vertexLoc - The location (one of the 6 vertices of one hex on the board) where the settlement is to be placed.
        Returns:
        true if the given vertex location is adjacent to at least one road that the player owns, the given location is empty, and the given location is at least 2 vertices away from every other municipality (city/settlement)

      • doBuildSettlement

        public boolean doBuildSettlement(VertexLocation vertexLoc)

      • canBuildCity

        public boolean canBuildCity(VertexLocation vertexLoc)
        Parameters:
        vertexLoc - The location (one of the 6 vertices of one hex on the board) where the city is to be placed.
        Returns:
        true if the given vertex location is adjacent to at least one road that the player owns, the given location is empty, and the player owns a settlement at the given location.
